name: The Up's Of Life
description:
A High On Life Demake

(That's still in production) 

You are a Bounty hunter that has travelled back to Blim City and notice that it's been over-run by the G3 Cartel. 

Your goal, is to explore the map and speak to the Blue turnstile which will allow you to leave the game and once you have done that you completed the demake. 

Go up to the top left to find the secret room and follow the arrows on the road to go to the next area 

Controls

\Gamepad Accessible only/

RT - To shoot,

Holding The Right Analog - Aim where you want to shoot, 

Left Analog - Movement,

Right Analog Button - Knifey (only purpose is to open LugBox's which are the chests).  

ALSO the coin mechanic is still in progress so it doesn't function properly
